article: the european union should take action to make it easier for citizens of member countries to cross borders to work , study or unite their families , an eu advisory group was quoted as saying by today 's international herald tribune , a daily newspaper published in the hague , the netherlands .
abstract: eu urged to ease border rules for own citizens
